tool_description: The Bhagavad Gita API is a digital gateway to the timeless wisdom and teachings of the Bhagavad Gita, one of the most revered texts in the world of spirituality and philosophy. This API offers developers and enthusiasts the opportunity to access the profound verses, insights, and verses from the Bhagavad Gita in a structured and programmable format.
name: Bhagavad Gita
title: Bhagavad Gita

api_list.name: Get Verse
api_list.description:
The Verse Endpoint of the Bhagavad Gita API offers a powerful and convenient way to access specific verses within the revered Bhagavad Gita scripture. This endpoint enables you to retrieve detailed information about a particular verse, including its text, translation, and contextual insights.

Endpoint Features:

Verse Selection: Specify the desired chapter number and verse number within the Bhagavad Gita to retrieve the text and associated teachings of that particular verse.

Verse Details: Access comprehensive information about the selected verse, including its text in the original language, translation, and any relevant commentary.

Contextual Insights: Gain a deeper understanding of the verse by accessing contextual information, historical significance, and interpretations.

How to Use the Verse Endpoint:

Request Format: Make a GET request to the /chapter/{chapter_number}/verse/{verse_number} endpoint, where {chapter_number} represents the chapter number and {verse_number} denotes the specific verse number you wish to access.

Authentication: Ensure that you have the required API key and authentication credentials for access.

Response: The API will respond with detailed information about the requested verse, including its text, translation, and any additional insights or commentary.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bhagavad-gita6.p.rapidapi.com/chapter/4/verse/7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bhagavad-gita6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Chapter
api_list.description:
The Chapter Endpoint of the Bhagavad Gita API provides a seamless and programmatic way to access specific chapters of the revered Bhagavad Gita. This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a particular chapter within the Bhagavad Gita scripture.

Endpoint Features:

Chapter Selection: Specify the desired chapter number within the Bhagavad Gita to retrieve its contents, verses, and associated teachings.

Verses and Insights: Access the verses, teachings, and insights contained within the chosen chapter. Retrieve the wisdom and knowledge that have inspired seekers for generations.

Verse Count: Retrieve information about the total number of verses in the selected chapter.

How to Use the Chapter Endpoint:

Request Format: Make a GET request to the chapter/{chapter_number} endpoint, where {chapter_number} is the specific chapter number you wish to access.

Authentication: Ensure that you have the required API key and authentication credentials for access.

Response: The API will respond with detailed information about the requested chapter, including its title, verse count, and the text of the verses.
